casebody.data:
No. 1097,

Misc.

Harris v. Illinois. John J. Cleary for petitioner. William J. Scott, Attorney General of Illinois, and James R. Thompson, Joel M. Flaum, James B. Zagel, and Thomas J. Immel, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.

App. Ct. Ill., 1st Dist. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice White is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
